products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Thunder Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Heres how you make a tonal palette bright and cheerful! The mix of greys and neutrals lend an earthy tone to the tightly packed leaf pattern, creating warmth amongst all that cool grey.    The pattern itself is a thing of beauty, dense and layered, all sharply drawn and stylishl

products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Summer Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Modern decor often calls for stark, tonal designs and minimalism, but this beautiful window dressing shows just how crisply contemporary a bright but simple palette can be.   Bright white, sumptuously soft fabric is covered with a dense pattern of forest undergrowth thats colour

products.title: Scandi Ferns Linen Winter Roman Blind
products.metadescription: Blue is always a cooling, calming colour, but in the scandi ferns linen winter roman blind it takes on a certain vibrance, even warmth, thanks to its dense leafy pattern.
